translations: 教堂拱门上之三拱式拱廊

sentences.sentence: The plans would also allow visitors for the first time into the triforium, a spectacular if dusty secret world 70ft above the nave, with a view described by John Betjeman as "the best in the world".
sentences.translation: 这些计划还将允许游客首次进入教堂拱廊，登上教堂正厅以上七十英尺那尘土飞扬的秘密世界。那里的壮观景色被约翰·贝杰曼描写为“世界上最美”的景色。
